content: with color chosen for raisins chain 3 slip_stitch in 2nd and 3rd chain from hook tie off create as many as you would like cinnamon swirl using the surface chain technique fashion swirls or squiggles of cinnamon finishing at this point you can decorate your bowl any way you like i chose to do two stripes using a surface chain see note below around the top of the bowl but you could attach felt dots or rick-rack anything you want to do you can do it s your bowl it s your oatmeal surface chain using a crochet hook make a slip knot hold slip knot to the back side of the fabric insert the hook through the fabric from the right side hook that slipknot and pull it up to the right side stick the hook back through the fabric loop the yarn around the hook and pull it up through the loop already in the fabric chain along the surface of the fabric as if making chain stitches in crochet create a line of surface chaining the entire process is similar to making a the foundations chain row but with the piece of finished material between it copyright 2008 christy hall antichristy all rights reserved pattern and pictures are the property of their creator please do not distribute sell or copy without permission if you like the pattern please link to it
